forecast.name: Tonight
forecast.shortForecast: Chance Showers And Thunderstorms then Showers And Thunderstorms Likely
forecast.detailedForecast: A chance of showers and thunderstorms before 11pm, then showers and thunderstorms likely. Cloudy, with a low around 53. North northeast wind around 5 mph. Chance of precipitation is 70%. New rainfall amounts between a tenth and quarter of an inch possible.

forecast.name: Tuesday
forecast.detailedForecast: Showers and thunderstorms likely before 8am, then rain likely between 8am and 2pm, then a chance of showers and thunderstorms between 2pm and 5pm, then a chance of rain. Mostly cloudy, with a high near 64. Southeast wind 3 to 7 mph. Chance of precipitation is 70%. New rainfall amounts between a tenth and quarter of an inch possible.

forecast.name: Tuesday Night
forecast.shortForecast: Chance Light Rain then Partly Cloudy
forecast.detailedForecast: A chance of rain before 8pm. Partly cloudy. Low around 50, with temperatures rising to around 52 overnight. North northwest wind 2 to 6 mph. Chance of precipitation is 30%. New rainfall amounts less than a tenth of an inch possible.

forecast.name: Wednesday
forecast.detailedForecast: Partly sunny, with a high near 70. North northwest wind 3 to 10 mph, with gusts as high as 18 mph.

nubsNob.comments: Thank you for making 2024-25 another great season! Stay tuned for updates, we look forward to having you back next year.
